draw.basic

Class RoundGradientContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.basic.RoundGradientContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.PaintContext

    public class RoundGradientContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.PaintContext
    This class implements the paint context for round gradients.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RoundGradientContext(java.awt.geom.Point2D middlePoint, java.awt.Color firstColor, double radius, java.awt.Color secondColor)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoundGradientContext

        public RoundGradientContext(java.awt.geom.Point2D middlePoint,
                    java.awt.Color firstColor,
                    double radius,
                    java.awt.Color secondColor)
        Parameters:
        middlePoint - Point2D object that is the middle point.
        firstColor - Color that is the color in the middle.
        radius - Double value corresponding to the radius of the circle.
        secondColor - Color that is the color at the border, towards which the middle color is slowly changed by the gradient.
